formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: to_value = from_value × (from_factor_to_base ÷ to_factor_to_base) Example (Historical length): 1 Roman mile (1479 m) → league (4828.032 m) value_in_league = 1 × (1479 ÷ 4828.032) ≈ 0.3065 league

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
